text.visit: This was known as Dragon Utopia, however, a mighty necromancer who wanted to have a kingdom of terror, decided to seize the Dragons to turn them into an army of undead that would fulfill their objective. Are you sure that you want to purge this Utopia?
You approach an unusual variant of Dragon Utopia where Faeries Dragons inhabit guarding great wealth. Do you want to attack this mystical place full of magic?

You approach an imposing Dragon Utopia, in the distance you see that Legendary Dragons live there that in your life you would have imagined living in a massive condominium. Do you want to test your powerful skills in this extreme place?
You have arrived in a forbidden floating land where the Fire Dragon sect is located, entering the castle is certain death if you don't have a powerful army behind you. Do you wish to raid the castle?
